mapper.sql: SELECT tt.*, c.t_id, t.t_name, c.c_name, sg.gd_name, s.sb_name, c.gd_no FROM timetable tt inner join course c on tt.c_no = c.c_no inner join teacher t on c.t_id = t.t_id inner join subject s on s.sb_no = c.sb_no inner join student_grade sg on c.gd_no = sg.gd_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timetable (c_no, tt_day, tt_starttime, tt_endtime, tt_version) VALUES(#{course.cNo}, #{ttDay}, #{ttStarttime}, #{ttEndtime}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM timetable WHERE c_no=#{course.cNo} AND tt_day=#{ttDay} AND tt_starttime=#{ttStarttime} AND tt_endtime=#{ttEndtime}
mapper.select: select ifnull((select tt1.tt_day from timetable tt1 where tt1.c_no = #{firstCNo} and tt1.tt_day in (select tt2.tt_day from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo})), 99)

select ifnull( (select tt1.tt_starttime from timetable tt1 where tt1.c_no = #{firstCNo} and tt1.tt_day = #{ttDay} and tt1.tt_starttime = (select tt2.tt_day from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo} and tt2.tt_day= #{ttDay})),99)

select ifnull( (select tt1.tt_starttime from timetable tt1 where tt1.c_no = #{firstCNo} and tt1.tt_day = #{ttDay} and tt1.tt_starttime between (select tt2.tt_starttime from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo} and tt2.tt_day= #{ttDay}) and (select tt2.tt_endtime from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo} and tt2.tt_day= #{ttDay}) ), 99)

select ifnull( (select tt1.tt_endtime from timetable tt1 where tt1.c_no = #{firstCNo} and tt1.tt_day = #{ttDay} and tt1.tt_endtime between (select tt2.tt_starttime from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo} and tt2.tt_day= #{ttDay}) and (select tt2.tt_endtime from timetable tt2 where tt2.c_no = #{lastCNo} and tt2.tt_day= #{ttDay})), 99)
